name: Revo Payments
overview:
Revo build’s integrated and vertically-focused ePayment Software Solutions.

REVO PAYMENTS is a financial technology company focused on electronic payments. Our solutions are delivered via web-based software that is built to support industry-specific needs.

Through a combination of customized software and innovative payment processes we: reduce the cost of handling payments; accelerate cash flow; enhance the payment experience for customers; store all payment records electronically; integrate payments with current software; ensure PCI security compliance.

We currently offer payment solutions for the following industries:Real Estate, Academic, Giving, B2B, and Retail. Through our software and service, we enable things like: Online Rent Payments, HOA Dues Payments, Online Donations, Online Tuition Payments, Online B2B Vendor Payments, Retail Gateway POS (Point of Sale) systems, and other paper-to-digital solutions.

Our software integrates services including: Check Conversion, Credit Card Processing, Electronic Checks, Recurring ACH, and all other forms of electronic payments, on a centralized platform that allows you to manage all your payments from one place.

The result is an integrated solution that supports online payments, phone payments, and face-to-face payments. We bring these services and technology to our clients, in order to convert industries and individual businesses from paper based transactions to digital transactions.

We thrive on the excitement of using technology to improve the way a business runs. Our goal is simple: To provide industry-focused epayment solutions that improve business. We achieve this goal through technology, education and service.
